name: 幻想水滸伝V 幻想新世界・音楽集
summary:
This is a promo arrange CD that comes with the limited edition release of Suikoden V. It features arranged music from both Suikoden V and Suikoden II.

Suikoden V BGM by Yoshihiro Tsukahara, Takashi Watanabe, Kuniyuki Takahashi, Chiharu Mukaiyama
Track 10 from Suikoden II, originally composed by Miki Higashino

Arranged by 
   Norikazu Miura (1,2)
   Naoyuki Sato (3,4)
   Nobuko Toda (5,6,7)
   Michiru Yamane (8)
info:
• 作曲: 山根ミチル
  • 别名: Genso Suikoden V Genso New World Music Collection
  • 发售日期: 2006-02-23
  • 价格: Not for Sale
  • 碟片数量: 1
